alert.note: Alert for Mingo (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:41PM EDT until May 16 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL BUCHANAN...NORTHWESTERN MCDOWELL...SOUTHEASTERN MINGO AND SOUTHWESTERN WYOMING COUNTIES... At 540 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Argo, or 15 miles north of Grundy, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... War, Hanover, Gilbert Creek, Davy, Bradshaw, Iaeger, Panther, Edgarton, Coalwood, Hurley and Avondale. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
